title: Sankoré Madrasah
description: A UNESCO World Heritage site, this ancient center of learning once held thousands of manuscripts.

title: Timbuktu Market
description: Bustling with life, this market offers spices, fabrics, and local crafts.

title: Ahmed Baba Institute
description: Home to thousands of ancient manuscripts preserving African scholarly heritage.

title: Djingareyber Mosque
description: One of the oldest mosques in continuous use, made from mudbrick and wood.

title: Sidi Yahya Mosque
description: Built in the 15th century, famous for its historical significance and architectural beauty.

title: Timbuktu Museum
description: Explore the culture and heritage of the region through exhibitions and artifacts.

title: Bouctou Garden
description: A peaceful garden space with native plants and shaded walkways.

title: Caravan Gateway
description: A symbolic point representing the historical trans-Saharan trade route.
